credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 25.1 x 20.3 cm (9 7/8 in. x 8 in.)
title: Fragment
medium:
Medium: linen, cotton, aluminum strips
Technique: double cloth
description: Handwoven fragment of evening coat fabric in matte white and silver metallic yarns in a very subtle vertical stripe.  Warp is of white cotton used in pairs; each weft consists of two white cotton yarns with one silver-colored yarn plied with red and green threads. The vertical stripe effect is caused by the exchange of wefts from one face of the double cloth to the other.
name: Fragment
